title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Quality Improvement of Online Open Courses and Deep Learning Strategy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in operating online education platforms and understanding of foundational social studies education theories
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and apply five core instructional elements that promote deep learning when designing online courses.
Learners can execute a process to analyze learner needs using a mixed-methods research approach (surveys and interviews).
Learners can establish strategies to enhance 21st-century competencies through project-based assessment designs that integrate digital environments and offline activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
